00001 /* num-timer.c  */
00002 #include <num.h>
00003 
00004 /*
00005  * the ROSS timer API is not so great.. 
00006  */
00007 
00008 void
00009 num_timer_cancel(tw_event * timer, tw_lp * lp)
00010 {
00011         if(timer->memory)
00012                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Membuf on timer!");
00013 
00014         rn_timer_cancel(lp, &timer);
00015 }
00016 
00017 tw_event *
00018 num_timer_start(tw_event * timer, tw_stime ts, tw_lp * lp)
00019 {
00020         ts += tw_now(lp);
00021 
00022         if(timer && timer->memory)
00023                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Membuf on timer!");
00024 
00025         if(timer && timer->state.b.abort)
00026                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Timer ABORT event!");
00027 
00028         if(!timer || timer == lp->cur_event)
00029                 timer = rn_timer_init(lp, ts);
00030         else
00031                 rn_timer_reset(lp, &timer, ts);
00032 //DEBUG
00033         //if (timer == 0x1aec81d0)
00034         //      tw_error(TW_LOC, "Event 0x1aec81d0");
00035 
00036         return timer;
00037 }
